aws_internet_gateway.description: Provides a resource to create a VPC Internet Gateway.

vpc_id.description: The VPC ID to create in.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the resource.
notes: It's recommended to denote that the AWS Instance or Elastic IP depends on the Internet Gateway. For example:

id.description: The ID of the Internet Gateway.

owner_id.description: The ID of the AWS account that owns the internet gateway.
